name: Drop-in: A Place to Play
description: Come Play with your young ones as they crawl, climb and explore our indoor playground like environment. This is a parent/caregiver participation activity. No drop-offs.
fullDescription: Come Play with your young ones as they crawl, climb and explore our indoor playground like environment. This is a parent/caregiver participation activity. No drop-offs.
whatTheyOffer: Come Play with your young ones as they crawl, climb and explore our indoor playground like environment. This is a parent/caregiver participation activity. No drop-offs.
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
